name: Hive Mind (itch) (Enigma)
description:
Platformer - where you control multiple instances of you

simultaneously. Arrows to move + jump. Goal is to

get all of you to safety.

For tile map editing - Tiled: https://www.mapeditor.org/

Importing tileset and maps to Unity - SuperTiled2Unity by Seanba: https://seanba.itch.io/supertiled2unity

Tileset: https://opengameart.org/content/platform-tileset-nature by Eris

CharacterController2D:

https://github.com/Brackeys/2D-Character-Controller from Brackeys
